benchmark_details.name: RepliBench
benchmark_details.overview: RepliBench is a suite of evaluations designed to measure autonomous replication capabilities of language model agents across various tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the autonomous replication capabilities of language model agents.

data.source: Generated tasks based on autonomous capabilities of language models.

methodology.calculation: Pass@k scores computed for each task family based on success attempts.
methodology.interpretation: A higher pass rate indicates better performance in executing the tasks.
methodology.validation: Comparison of performance among different models.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: To minimize misuse and ensure responsible handling of capabilities.
